Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:34:53
Folder: CPU1G3B - notification updation in vpn environment
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CPU1G3B_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-11 13:03
Subject: Notification: Updation in VPN Environment
--------------------------------------------------
 

 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague, 

We are aware that users connected to the HO1, D3 and KSA networks are currently experiencing issues accessing VPN remotely.

To resolve this, please follow the updated steps below to reconfigure your VPN connection:

________________________________

 

VPN Setup Instructions

1.	On your Windows device, open the Company Portal application (search for "Company Portal" in the Start menu).
2.	Search for Ivanti Secure Access in the Company Portal.
3.	Download and install the Ivanti Secure Access client application.
4.	Add the HO1/ D3/ KSA network by clicking on the + next to connections
5.	Use the links:

 

HO1 users: https://ho1ssl.e-mac.com/   

D3 users:  https://d3ssl.e-mac.com <https://d3ssl.e-mac.com/> 

KSA users: https://bhssl.e-mac.com/saml

 

After the connection is added, log in using your Chalhoub credentials to establish VPN access Ivanti Connect Secure


For support during this period, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.
